text: Vidalasia is a genus of flowering plants in the family Rubiaceae. The genus is found in Malaysia, Thailand, Vietnam, and the Philippines. ==Species== *Vidalasia fusca *Vidalasia morindifolia *Vidalasia murina *Vidalasia pubescens *Vidalasia tonkinensis ==References== Category:Rubiaceae genera Category:Gardenieae
title: Vidalasia
